entry.string: Access MySQL via simple web terminal

SECURITY WARNING:
Do not leave your backup file in a web browsable directory.
Remember to delete it, or move it to a secure directory.
Warning! Check your selection before continuing.
Check to delete your ADOdb cache files in path
SiteTools is a utility module that provides a number of related site 'housekeeping' utilities
Backup your MySQL database tables (MySQL 3.22 or higher required) Testing feedback appreciated.
SiteTools only provides Administration options requiring administration priviledges.

Warning: Default cache and backup directory paths should only be changed if alternative cache or backup paths have already been created and are writeable - chmod 777. At this time, backup paths are configurable, but cache paths are not configurable from within Xaraya administration.
Extended information about this module can be found at

The default cache paths are entered below.
Change them only if you have changed default cache directory paths.
Note there is no trailing slash in the path names.
This option will optimize your MySQL database tables.
